metadata.synopsis: One liner with a female Human worker outside the Baldurs Mouth building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the female human worker outside the Baldurs Mouth building at coords: 82, 41, -44

0.speaker: Bronte
0.text: Newsflash, dipshit - you're interrupting me. Make like a page and turn.

1.speaker: Bronte
1.text: Listen, pal, if you're not moving my share of broadsheets, you're in my way. Shift!
